siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Conversational forms made with Tripetto are now even smarter. Use the new calculator to create quizzes, order forms and more. Fast and no-code. It does all the basics (+ − × ÷), but also supports powerful formulas and even math. Plus, it's a free feature!
blogPost.body: Conversational forms made with Tripetto are now even smarter. Use the new calculator to create quizzes, order forms and more. Fast and no-code. It does all the basics (+ − × ÷), but also supports powerful formulas and even math. Plus, it's a free feature!
blogPost.title: Tripetto 3.0 - Free Typeform alternative with next-level calculations
blogPost.author: Mark van den Brink

localize.description: 用Tripetto制作的对话表单现在更加智能。使用新的计算器来创建测验，订单表格和更多。快速且无需编码。它可以完成所有的基本操作（+ - × ÷），但也支持强大的公式，甚至数学。另外，它是一个免费的功能!
localize.tagline: 具有下一级计算功能的免费Typeform替代品

localize.description: 用Tripetto製作的對話表單現在更加智能。使用新的計算器來創建測驗，訂單表格和更多。快速且無需編碼。它可以完成所有的基本操作（+ - × ÷），但也支持強大的公式，甚至數學。另外，它是一個免費的功能!
localize.tagline: 具有下一級計算功能的免費Typeform替代品

previous.excerpt: Entry is a FaceID for desktops. It enables users to securely authenticate online using regular webcams with no compromise to privacy and security. Add Entry to your Single Sign-On provider as a factor and authenticate by face, just like on a mobile device.
previous.title: Entry - Biometric Authentication Factor for SSO

localize.description: Entry是一款适用于台式机的FaceID。它使用户能够使用常规的网络摄像头安全地进行在线身份验证，而不影响隐私和安全。将 Entry 添加到您的单点登录提供商中作为一个因子，并通过脸部验证，就像在移动设备上一样。
localize.tagline: 用于单点登录的生物识别认证因素

localize.description: Entry是一款適用於臺式機的FaceID。它使用戶能夠使用常規的網絡攝像頭安全地進行在線身份驗證，而不影響隱私和安全。將 Entry 添加到您的單點登錄提供商中作爲一個因子，並通過臉部驗證，就像在移動設備上一樣。
localize.tagline: 用於單點登錄的生物識別認證因素

next.excerpt: Once we asked ourselves, 'Why are expense trackers so expensive?' We decided to correct this unfairness and ready to present to your attention the first completely free expense tracker.
next.title: Le Ruble – free expense tracker - Take control of your money

localize.description: 有一次我们问自己："为什么费用追踪器这么贵？我们决定纠正这种不公平的现象，并准备向您介绍第一个完全免费的费用追踪器。
有一次我們問自己："爲什麼費用追蹤器這麼貴？我們決定糾正這種不公平的現象，並準備向您介紹第一個完全免費的費用追蹤器。
